description: [Moses Staff](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1009) has built malware, such as [DCSrv](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1033) and [PyDCrypt](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1032), for targeting victims' machines.(Citation: Checkpoint MosesStaff Nov 2021)

external_references.description: Checkpoint Research. (2021, November 15). Uncovering MosesStaff techniques: Ideology over Money. Retrieved August 11, 2022.
